servinfo.title: Electronic Control System Description
servinfo.ptxt: The electronic control system consists of 1) various sensors, switches, ECUs which detect the state of engine and driving conditions, 2) ECM which controls various electric control devices according to the signals from “1)” and 3) various electric control devices.
Functionally, it is divided into the following subsystems:
Especially, ECUs (included in ECM) intercommunicate by means of CAN communication.
Refer to Engine and Emission Control System Flow Diagram:N32A and Engine Control System Circuit Diagram:N32A .
